page.title: 10Caravan Parks.
page.content: Today we went to Heathfield Court Caravan Park. We talked to Joan who was the receptionist. She told us about the people that came there for a holiday. They come mostly from big cities like London and Birmingham but some come from abroad. She mentioned the U.S.A., countries in Europe and Korea. They usually stay for a week or two. We visited the site in May and there were a considerable number of caravaners there.The season goes on to the end of September. The site is round and about the ruins of Stepaside Iron Works which closed in l877. Only some of the visitors are interested although the brochure mentions it. We spoke to one caravaner.She came from England and she said she was not really interested in the Iron Works only in the peace and tranquility of the area.They have a Club on site.
